snippet: The American Academy of Arts and Sciences has defended its president, Leslie Cohen Berlowitz, who is accused of falsely claiming to have earned a doctorate.
abstract: American Academy of Arts and Sciences says it is standing behind its president, Leslie Cohen Berlowitz, following accusations she had falsely claimed on at least two grant proposals to have doctorate; accusations reported in The Boston Globe sent shock waves through intellectual circles, along with speculation that Berlowitz might be out the door.
lead_paragraph: The American Academy of Arts and Sciences has defended its president, Leslie Cohen Berlowitz, who is accused of falsely claiming to have earned a doctorate.

headline.seo: Academy of Arts and Sciences Defends Its Leader’s Honesty
headline.main: Arts and Sciences Academy Defends Leader’s Honesty
headline.print_headline: Arts and Sciences Academy Defends Leader’s Honesty

keywords.value: American Academy of Arts and Sciences
